com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging

Class SampledLoggingService<I extends Request,O extends Response>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.DecoratingService<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.server.SimpleDecoratingService<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.LoggingService<I,O>
          • com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging.SampledLoggingService<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Request type
    O - the Response type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Service<I,O>

    public class SampledLoggingService<I extends Request,O extends Response>
extends LoggingService<I,O>
    Decorates a Service to log Requests and Responses. Same as LoggingService but can configure what kind of data will be logging.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SampledLoggingService(Service<I,O> delegate, LogLevel level, boolean logRequest, boolean logResponse, float logSamplingRate)
      Creates a new instance that logs Requests and Responses at the specified LogLevel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static <I extends Request,O extends Response>
      Function<Service<I,O>,SampledLoggingService<I,O>>      		 newDecorator(boolean logRequest, boolean logResponse, float logSamplingRate)
      Creates a new instance that logs Requests at LogLevel.INFO if logRequest is true and logs Responses at LogLevel.INFO if logRequest is true.
      static <I extends Request,O extends Response>
